擔.definition: picul (100 catties, 50 kg); two buckets full; carrying pole and its load; classifier for loads carried on a shoulder pole

擔仔麵.definition: ta-a noodles or danzai noodles, popular snack originating from Tainan

擔任.definition: to hold a governmental office or post; to assume office of; to take charge of; to serve as

擔子.definition: carrying pole and the loads on it; burden; task; responsibility; CL:副[fu4]

擔待.definition: to pardon; please excuse (me); to take responsibility

擔心.definition: anxious; worried; uneasy; to worry; to be anxious

擔擔麵.definition: Sichuan noodles with a spicy and numbing sauce

擔擱.definition: variant of 耽擱|耽搁[dan1 ge5]

擔當.definition: to take upon oneself; to assume

擔誤.definition: variant of 耽誤|耽误[dan1 wu5]

擔負.definition: to shoulder; to bear; to undertake
